itqan_description: "Itqan Capital" is an investment company that offers Sharia-compliant investment products and services, operating in the Saudi financial market and the markets of the Gulf Cooperation Council countries
financial_services: We offer you a range of financial services, research, asset management, and other specialized services
murabaha_sukuk_fund: Itqan Fund for Murabaha and Sukuk
itqan_intro: The culture of excellence is ingrained in how we behave and work together, for the benefit of our clients and as one team.
itqan_vision_text: Itqan Capital aims to be the leading company in Saudi Arabia, providing suitable investment opportunities and products for retirement funds, charitable and endowment institutions, private and public companies, and wealthy individuals and family businesses.
itqan_mission_text: We believe in the values of authenticity, credibility, professionalism, and adherence to Sharia rules and provisions. Our pursuit of excellence continues tirelessly, no matter our achievements.
itqan_culture_text_1: The culture of Itqan is deeply rooted in what we offer to our clients and to ourselves as a team.
itqan_culture_text_2: Complete commitment to serving our clients
itqan_culture_text_3: Preservation of the spirit of creativity and innovation
itqan_culture_text_4: Constant pursuit of excellence and efficiency
distinction_card1_text: We do not just fulfill our duties, we pursue them with passion. Our commitment to serving our clients always comes first.
distinction_card2_text: We are all determined to excel in efficiency, ethics, and discipline. We move steadily towards achieving our goals.
distinction_card3_text: Creativity, experience, and authenticity help us excel in what we pursue and exceed our clients' expectations.

privacy_policy: We are committed to protecting and respecting your privacy. The information provided in this form will only be used to communicate with you and respond to your inquiries.

company_description: “Itqan Capital” is an investment company headquartered in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, licensed by the Capital Market Authority.
newsletter_description: Join us to stay updated on all new investment tips
rights_reserved: Itqan Capital © 2024. All rights reserved. Created For Itqan Capital
seo_title: Itqan Capital: Leadership in Islamic Investment and Financial Services in Saudi Arabia
seo_description: Discover Itqan Capital, the leading Saudi company offering Sharia-compliant investment products and services. With a focus on precision, passion, and excellence, we are committed to achieving the highest investment standards for our clients in the Saudi financial market and GCC markets.
about_us_paragraph_1: Itqan Capital is a Saudi closed joint stock company providing Sharia-compliant investment products and services in the Saudi financial market and GCC Arab countries markets. The company is licensed by the Capital Market Authority to engage in dealing, managing investments and operating funds, arranging, advising, and custody in securities operations. The company holds a commercial registration number (4030167335) dated 2007/3/6, with a paid-up capital of (56,042,030) Saudi Riyals. Itqan Capital is licensed by the Saudi Capital Market Authority under license number (37-07058) dated 2007/04/09 and started its operations on 2008/04/29.
about_us_paragraph_2: We strive with all our strength and determination to lead and be the most trusted Saudi company in offering investment offers to individuals, organizations, institutions, and private companies. Itqan is our name and our message that carries within it the values and concepts we believe in: perfection, precision, and passion. We provide guidance based on these values, offering a range of professional and trustworthy services. At Itqan Capital, we focus on designing and managing a variety of the best investment products and services that achieve profitable returns for investors, considering potential risks and strong growth for our company's shareholders.
about_us_paragraph_3: Itqan Capital is wholly owned by Al Zamil Development & Investment Holding Company, a specialized company in several sectors with a record of achievements inside and outside the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
AboutUS_title: Itqan Capital: Leading in Islamic investment and financial services in the Kingdom.
AboutUS_description: Discover Ihsan Capital, the leading Saudi company in providing Sharia-compliant investment products and services. With a focus on precision, passion, and excellence, we are committed to achieving the highest investment standards for our clients in the Saudi financial market and Gulf Cooperation Council countries.
shariyah_review_paragraph: Itqan Capital collaborates with the Sharia Supervisory Board, whose team is committed to working with us and providing Sharia-compliant solutions for our products. Effective communication with their network of Sharia advisors effectively supports our rapid product launches, giving us competitive advantages.
learn_more_button: Learn More About the Sharia Supervisory Board
advisory_research_title: Advisory and Research Services at Itqan Capital - Investment Advisory and Research Capabilities
advisory_research_description: Explore advisory and research services provided by Itqan Capital, including investment advisory and research capabilities supporting its core activities in direct investment, investment banking, and conservation services.
wealth_management_services_description1: The Wealth Management team works to meet the investment needs of individual and corporate clients by offering a variety of innovative and distinctive products and services that meet our clients' needs and achieve their investment ambitions, God willing.
wealth_management_services_description2: The Wealth Management team possesses scientific qualifications and extensive experience in serving the interests of our clients, investors, and the community at large by offering the best investment products and services that yield profitable returns for clients while considering potential risks, thereby building strong, long-term relationships with our clients.
conservation_services_title: Conservation Services at Itqan Capital - Real Estate Fund and Direct Investment
conservation_services_description: Learn about the conservation services offered by Itqan Capital, including real estate funds and direct investment, benefiting from expertise in wealth management to achieve sustainable and favorable investment goals for investors.
conservation_services_main_description: We are highly committed to maintaining our leadership by delivering exceptional, tailored services in real estate, private direct investment, and investment funds. We consult with each client to identify their specific needs and design necessary solutions to meet their company goals. With Itqan Capital's streamlined business and operational capabilities, we offer seamless services to our clients with a competitive fee structure.
client_awareness_title: Customer Service at Itqan Capital - Reports, Data, Complaint Procedures
client_awareness_description: Discover customer service at Itqan Capital, including recent financial market reports, complaint procedures, and investor protection guide to ensure a safe and transparent investment experience.

managementTeamTitle: Itqan Team - Management Team - Itqan Capital
managementTeamDescription: Learn about the members of the management team at Itqan Capital, including CEO Basam Hashem El-Sayed, and benefit from the unique experiences and specialties that each member brings to the company.
footer.companyDescription: Itqan Capital is an investment company based in Saudi Arabia and licensed by the Capital Market Authority.
footer.newsletterDescription: Join us to keep you updated on all new investment tips
footer.copyright: Itqan Capital © 2024. All rights reserved. Created for Itqan Capital
saudi_equity_fund_paragraph: The Itqan Capital Saudi Equity Fund is an open-ended investment fund aimed at achieving capital growth in the medium to long term through investment in shares of companies listed on the main Saudi Stock Exchange or listed on the Parallel Saudi Stock Exchange (Nomu), initial public offerings and rights issues listed on the main Saudi Stock Exchange or listed on the Parallel Saudi Stock Exchange (Nomu), exchange traded funds (ETFs), real estate investment trusts, Saudi equity investment funds, cash market funds, licensed fixed income and cash instruments and quasi-money that comply with Shari'a controls with a minimum credit rating- BBB or its equivalent in credit rating agencies.
fund_paragraph: The Murabaha and Sukuk Fund aims to achieve attractive returns for investors in the short and medium term, compliant with Sharia investment guidelines. It aims to preserve investor capital and provide liquidity as needed, employing optimal risk management practices. To achieve its investment objectives, the fund will primarily invest in the Saudi market in a diversified investment portfolio consisting of high-quality, short-term investment instruments that comply with Sharia investment guidelines, including:
fund_point2: Sukuk in all its forms, directly and indirectly, up to 30% of the net asset value of the fund.
fund_point3: Investment units in funds that mainly invest in Murabaha and/or Sukuk.
fund_point4: Investment units in funds investing in various investment instruments including Murabaha, speculation, manufacturing, and the ladder.
murabaha_sukuk_fund_paragraph: The Itqan Murabaha and Sukuk Fund aims to achieve attractive returns for investors in the short and medium term, in compliance with Islamic investment principles, and to preserve investor capital and provide redemption flexibility as needed, effectively managing risks. To achieve its investment objectives, the fund will primarily invest in the Saudi market in a diversified investment portfolio consisting of high-quality, short-term investment instruments compliant with Islamic investment principles, including:
murabaha_sukuk_fund_point2: Sukuk in various forms, directly and indirectly, up to 30% of the net asset value of the fund.
murabaha_sukuk_fund_point3: Investment funds investing primarily in Murabaha and/or Sukuk.
murabaha_sukuk_fund_point4: Investment funds investing in various investment instruments including Murabaha, speculation, manufacturing, and salam.
portfolio_management_paragraph: Successful wealth management is directly linked to the quality of fundamental advice, which in turn depends on the expertise and capabilities of the advisor. At Itqan, our experienced team of specialists focuses on developing and implementing optimal strategies for each client individually, relying on external expertise when necessary. Instead of providing ready-made solutions, which are often the cornerstone of major wealth management firms, we focus on delivering responses that precisely meet personal needs, expectations, and risk tolerance.
private_box_title: Your Private Box Title in English
private_box_subtitle: Your Private Box Subtitle in English
private_box_button: Your Private Box Button Text in English
murabaha_sukuk_paragraph: The Murabaha and Sukuk Fund aims to achieve attractive returns for investors in the short and medium term, in compliance with Sharia principles. It focuses on preserving investor capital and providing flexible redemption options to manage risks optimally. To achieve its investment objectives, the fund primarily invests in the Saudi market through a diversified investment portfolio comprising high-quality short-term investment instruments that comply with Sharia principles, including:
murabaha_sukuk_point2: Sukuk (Islamic bonds) of various types, directly and indirectly, up to a maximum of 30% of the fund's net asset value.
murabaha_sukuk_point3: Investment units in funds focusing on Murabaha and/or Sukuk primarily.
murabaha_sukuk_point4: Investment units in funds that invest in various investment instruments, including Murabaha, speculation, manufacturing, and leasing.
investment_banking_seo_title: Investment Banking Services by Itqan Capital - Public Offerings and Direct Investment
investment_banking_seo_description: Explore investment banking services offered by Itqan Capital, including public offerings and direct investment. Get strategic financial consulting that effectively and professionally meets our clients' needs.
public_offerings_subtitle: When identifying a market gap, Itqan Capital looks for private equity offering opportunities to present ideas and recommendations to current or potential clients. Apart from traditional public offerings, private equity offerings meet the needs of companies looking to increase equity, as well as investors seeking attractive medium-term alternatives for investing their excess liquidity.
initial_public_offerings_subtitle: Thanks to our extensive experience in the financial sector in Saudi Arabia, our team has a unique advantage in identifying and maximizing financial and investment opportunities.
initial_public_offerings_size: We provide strategic financial consulting to our clients, which makes us adopt a new and customized approach in every task we undertake.
direct_investment_description: We search for, identify, arrange, and manage investments individually or in partnership with clients in the MENA region across three main asset classes. Our specialists identify and develop outstanding opportunities with real growth potential, both financially and socially, which form a fundamental axis in our compliance with Islamic Sharia principles.
private_direct_investment_content: Itqan Capital seeks to contribute to companies with good financial positions, capable management, a clear strategy involving opportunities for growth and profitable exit, and commitment to Sharia guidelines and principles. By providing support in the form of additional working capital, bank financing, or strategic guidance, and working in partnership with the current owners or management team, Itqan Capital achieves good profit returns during the ownership period and capital gains upon exit. We typically focus on companies valued between $3-15 million, or larger companies with other participating investors, headquartered in the MENA region.
real_estate_content: At Itqan Capital, we follow a comprehensive strategic approach to real estate investment. Our services cover the entire process - from purchase to post-acquisition management and final sale. Our real estate investments are spread across Saudi Arabia (and more broadly in the MENA region in special cases) with a focus on housing, retail spaces, commercial spaces, and office sectors. We also consider real estate development projects that meet certain criteria.
securities_content: Our experts identify companies that demonstrate proven growth potential, capable management, attractive business areas, and sustainable competitive advantage for investment purposes. Itqan Capital achieves great successes in these efforts, achieving returns that significantly exceed benchmark returns. We focus on stocks that generate substantial profits in addition to undervalued stocks, using a clear selection criterion for investing in securities.
financing_arrangement_subtitle: Structuring and arranging corporate finance is one of Itqan Capital's key professional strengths. With our long experience in this field, supported by the liberalization of commercial and investment regulations in the Kingdom, in addition to the Saudi government's recent injection of more cash liquidity into the economy, we can play a pioneering role in project financing. We take a comprehensive approach to the project, facilitating cross-border implementation between banks from each party's place of residence, when necessary.
mergers_acquisitions_subtitle: Our approach to merger and acquisition transactions is comprehensive - starting from commissioning advice and/or negotiating potential deals to introducing potential partners - a rare and unique service in this region. Our experts take the initiative to explore opportunities in many sectors in the currently bustling Saudi Arabia.
contact_us_seo_title: Contact Us for Support and Answers to Your Inquiries - Itqan Capital
contact_us_seo_description: We at Itqan Capital are here to help and provide support. Contact us now via email, phone, or by filling out the contact form. We will respond to your inquiries as soon as possible.

riskAssessment.question3: 3. How would you react if your investment value suddenly declined?

riskAssessment.question5: 5. What percentage of your total capital (excluding real estate and non-cash investments) will you use for this investment?
riskAssessment.resultLowRisk: Total points from (1) to (6): Low risk (We recommend investing in low-risk products)
riskAssessment.resultMediumRisk: Total points from (7) to (15): Medium to high risk (We recommend investing in medium-risk products)
riskAssessment.resultHighRisk: Total points above (15): High risk (We recommend investing in high-risk products)
